access.name: Festival Entrance
access.description: Main festival entrance through Garbicz village

access.name: Backstage Access
access.description: The backstage area is for Crew, Tenants and Artists that have been specially invited

stages.name: Lichtung
stages.description: Sanctuary for human connection, workshops, performances, healing sounds, live concerts, sauna, reiki, massages.
stages.details: Workshops, Teebar, Sauna, Sober Space, Cacao & Adaptogenics, Brazilian Food

stages.name: Ali's Teebar
stages.description: Fresh herbal brew to calm your mind, focus your spirit, and relax
stages.details: Perfect place for tea and spiritual connection

stages.name: See Floor
stages.description: The village square of Garbicz Festival. Everything is allowed! From afternoon cooking shows to mindless niche raving.
stages.details: Cooking shows, folkloric concerts, cabaret, drag performances, niche rave

stages.name: BuK Corner
stages.description: Forest stage by the lake with deep house, minimal, and hypnotic grooves
stages.details: Nestled among birch and beech trees, underground legends to rising talents

stages.name: Wiese Floor
stages.description: House music floor with smooth, soulful beats and chill vibes
stages.details: Perfect place for warm, soulful house music and good times

stages.name: Loco Paradiso
stages.description: Ambientfloor - Multidimensional sanctuary of deep listening and sensory immersion
stages.details: World music, organic-electronic soundscapes, sunrise rituals, video installations

stages.name: Pleisure Island
stages.description: Where afro meets trance, nail art is essential, tooth gems sparkle. Softness is a superpower.
stages.details: Between disco and desire, running and raving, performance and play

stages.name: Wald Floor
stages.description: Hard driving techno beats with next level light setup and mind-blowing laser show
stages.details: Perfect for those who crave heavier, more energetic sounds

stages.name: Juicy
stages.description: Started as juice hut, became viby dancefloor. Good drinks, groovy tunes. Keep it juicy!
stages.details: Quirky team, boogie followers, best freaks from around the world

stages.name: Temple
stages.description: Sacred space for deeper musical and spiritual experiences

stages.name: Ambient Floor
stages.description: A dedicated space for immersive, relaxing, and experimental sound experiences, distinct from the festival's more energetic dance stages.

food.name: Food Court Central
food.description: Central food area with diverse international cuisine
food.details: Multiple vendors: Breakfast Club, NOMI, Schnitzel Terrace, Pizza, Burgers, and more

food.name: Breakfast Club
food.description: Breakfast buffet with freshly baked bread, cheese, spreads, cereals

food.name: Caroli's Coffee & Bar
food.description: Morning coffee, margaritas, daiquiris, bubbles in golden Garbicz mug

food.name: NOMI Terrace
food.description: High up terrace with champagne breakfast and wine experience

food.name: Wine Bar
food.description: Garbicz cult classic with wine, bubbles, music, friends on comfy couches
food.details: Open 24/7, perfect for hanging and getting winy

services.name: Festival Info
services.description: Information, lost & found, top-up station, phone charging, troubleshooting
services.details: Located near Wiese, helps with cashless payment system and wristband issues

services.name: Medical Team
services.description: German, English and Polish speaking medics always present
services.details: Located next to food court, here to help and care at any time

services.name: Awareness Team
services.description: Creating safer spaces, fighting discrimination, supporting festival-goers
services.details: Next to Eclipse and Medics, listeners and supporters against sexism, racism, discrimination

services.name: Artist Care
services.description: Here we care for artists quite alot

camping.name: Silent Camping
camping.description: Quiet camping area for rest and tranquility, no sound systems allowed

camping.name: Main Camping
camping.description: Main guest camping area within walking distance of stages

art.name: Nerdwald
art.description: Art installations area with experimental and playful exhibits
art.details: Attractor, kuker/site, windchime, Promises, Breakthrough Bar, Physics in woods

art.name: Performance Space
art.description: Queer cabaret, neo-punk energy, choir performances
art.details: MIDUMMER NIGHTS CREAM, MUOVIPUSSI from Finland, SPIEVY chanting
